colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES DPAL YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS KYI MCHOD PA MYUR MDZAD DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYUD STONG NAS RGYAN PA THAD RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG THUGS RJES 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, BLA MA MGON PO'I RNAL 'BYOR PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE 'KHOR BA GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
